column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////I can't believe how good that pizza was
column2: way better than anticipated... We got a medium
column4: gooey with the butter garlic crust. I don't think I've ever enjoyed a pizza this much in my life. The 30 minute wait to get the pizza was more like 20 and it was worth every second. Service was good
column5: and the soft drinks are CRAZY HUGE.
